steps.name: I am on homepage
I mouse hover and click on Laptops & Notebooks tab
I click on "Show All Laptops & Notebooks"
I select sort by "Price (High > Low)"
I Select Product "MacBook"
I verify the productText "MacBook"
I click on "Add To Cart" button on MacBook page
I verify the MacBook message "Success: You have added MacBook to your shopping cart!"

arguments.val: Success: You have added MacBook to your shopping cart!

steps.name: I click on link “shopping cart” display on MacBook page
I verify the text "Shopping Cart" from MacBook page
I verify the text "MacBook" product name
I change the quantity "2"
I click on "Update" tab
I verify the message "Success: You have modified your shopping cart!" on MacBook page

arguments.val: Success: You have modified your shopping cart!

steps.name: I verify the Total £737.45
I click on "Checkout" button on MACBook page
I verify the text "checkout" on MacBook page shopping cart
I verify the text "New Customer" on MacBook page
I click on "Guest Checkout" radio button
I click on "Continue" tab on MacBook page
I enter below details in the form
I click on "Continue" Button on checkout page
I add comments about your order into text area
I check the Terms & Conditions check box
I click on continue
I verify the message "Warning: Payment method required!" on checkout page
